projects.title: Pink Data Insights
projects.description: End-to-end data analysis project focused on sales data, including exploratory data analysis, feature engineering, SQL queries using SQLite, and business-driven insights.

projects.title: Sales Dashboard
projects.description: Interactive dashboard displaying sales performance by region and product, enabling data-driven decision making.

projects.title: Web Application
